      private java.util.Map<Station,java.lang.Double> Line.fares
      Map of stations that the line go through and for each station the value(Double) is the fare(ride-cost) for the ride in this line from a certain station.

      java.util.Map<Station,java.lang.Integer> TheCarmelit.numOfActivitiesMadeInEachStation()
      This query return a Map of Key=Station, Value=number of activities made in the key station for each station calculate the number of activities happened in this station and put in the Map the station and the number.
      Methods in core with parameters of type Station 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Line.addStationAndRideFare(Station station, java.lang.Double fareInStation)
      this method add a new station which this line go through and save the given fare for the ride in this line from this station notice that a Map cannot hold 2 identical keys notice to check if the given station is not already in this line Map if you won't check it, then the new Key will ran over the current station Key and the "old" fare will be lost.
      boolean Line.removeStation(Station stationToRemove)
      removes a station from the map use this for ROLLBACK situations.
